column1: Master of Science in Aerospace Engineering
column2: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
column5: Virginia Tech’s tradition of outstanding design in aerospace engineering emphasizes:aerodynamicsstructurespropulsionflight mechanics"The online M.S. degree in Aerospace Engineering is offered in a convenient, flexible format that accommodated my working full-time and starting a family. The…staff and faculty were supportive and prompt at answering questions, which made the online experience very rewarding. The degree has been a valuable investment in my future that would not have been available to me in a traditional face-to-face format. Even in a virtual environment, the staff and faculty truly made me feel like a Hokie.”Vanessa Aubuchon, Aerospace Engineering Graduate, 2013Required courses for an M.S. in aerospace engineering
